sn38.11:1.6: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada, etesam oghanam pahanaya”ti?
sn38.11:1.7: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada, etesam oghanam pahanaya”ti.
sn38.11:1.8: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada, etesam oghanam pahanaya”ti?
sn38.11:1.9: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo, etesam oghanam pahanaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.11:1.11: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada, etesam oghanam pahanaya”ti.
sn38.11:1.12: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etesam oghanam pahanaya.
